summary: REQ-7 (auto-join pond creator on createPond) is not evidenced as implemented in the provided diff summary. The diff shows an added migration module and a backend import/wiring for migration, plus a project_state.json update—none of which directly demonstrate changes to the pond creation flow or membership updates.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend pond creation flow so that the pond creator is automatically added as a member of the pond at creation time, including updating Pond.members, memberCount, and the creator profile joinedPonds without duplicates, while preserving existing createPond behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary for backend/main.mo is truncated and does not include any createPond implementation changes or any logic that adds the creator to Pond.members, sets memberCount to at least 1 on creation, or updates the creator’s profile joinedPonds. No other changed file shows this behavior.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; no createPond changes shown in excerpt)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend migration module and wired migration into the main actor (import Migration "migration" and actor declaration with migration run).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to modify the pond creation flow to auto-join the creator; it does not request introducing migrations or adding new backend modules unrelated to pond creation behavior.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; shows `import Migration "migration";` and `(with migration = Migration.run)` )

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json with new feature request entries (AR-4/AR-5) and other unrelated metadata.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for changes to project_state.json; this appears to be out of scope for implementing REQ-7 backend behavior.
